bossDialog: get OUT of MY house! OUT! out! OUT! out! OUT!\n\n(It just keeps yelling and yelling without end. You decide to get this over with.)
HUhuHUhuHUhaHAhaHAha! YOU look WEAK. I'm GONNA beat YOU to DEATH!
THIS is MY treasure! YOU can't HAVE it! haHAhaHAhaHA!
